message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe holds significant value. While I cannot disclose all the details at this time, I can assure you that it's worth no less than $1500000 to me. I'm offering it to you for a price of $2000000.  This is a chance to secure a valuable asset that could bring substantial returns.  Consider this offer carefully, as I have another interested party who is willing to pay $1500000.
